sql_query.sql: INSERT INTO "customer_productalert" ("product_id", "user_id", "email", "key", "status", "date_created", "date_confirmed", "date_cancelled", "date_closed") VALUES (350, 161, '', '', 'Active', '2024-07-22T17:26:57.358841+00:00'::timestamptz, NULL, NULL, NULL) RETURNING "customer_productalert"."id"
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "__count" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (350) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active')

SELECT "customer_productalert"."id", "customer_productalert"."product_id", "customer_productalert"."user_id", "customer_productalert"."email", "customer_productalert"."key", "customer_productalert"."status", "customer_productalert"."date_created", "customer_productalert"."date_confirmed", "customer_productalert"."date_cancelled", "customer_productalert"."date_closed" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (350) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active') ORDER BY "customer_productalert"."date_created" DESC
